name: Input-Pal
description:
Input-Pal is a puzzle platformer where your own inputs are an expendable puzzle solving tool, which you must utilize in order to escape each room. Carefully decide what you will and won't need, and shoot for the fastest times you can.

Use of a controller is highly recommended! The game works natively with both Dual-shock 4 and X-input controllers.

NOTE: There's some missing collision in the penultimate level of the game, but it's still fully beatable. Sorry about that mishap. I hope you still have fun!

Programming and Design - @ZazSaysStuff

Art and Design - @wendyisurfrendy

Level Design and Moral Support - @Drooling_Demon

Music by Abstraction: http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/
